text:
Dynamit - http://www.dynamit.com/careers - Columbus, OH - .NET, Java (Dallas, TX), but all other tech welcome to apply

Main clients: - Panda Express - Hilton - WhataBurger - Donatos - Limited Brands

Get to sink your teeth into hot new tech, enjoy a very nice, new office space, and enjoy AM/PMs that don't under quote and over work.
